meanings.definition: The pursuit of pleasure, especially in food and drink.
meanings.sent1: Her epicurisms led her to explore various cuisines and flavors.
meanings.sent2: Many people enjoy indulging in epicurisms by trying new dishes.
meanings.sent3: His epicurisms were so intense that he even dreamt of delicious meals.
meanings.sent4: In the world of epicurisms, each meal is a symphony of flavors.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the bakery filled her with epicurisms for freshly baked bread.

meanings.definition: A devotion to luxurious living and sensual pleasures.
meanings.sent1: Their epicurisms were evident in the lavish parties they hosted.
meanings.sent2: The mansion was a symbol of their dedication to epicurisms.
meanings.sent3: She jokingly referred to her love for spa days as her epicurisms.
meanings.sent4: The garden was a paradise where their epicurisms blossomed.
meanings.sent5: The cruise ship offered a haven for those seeking epicurisms in every corner.
